name: The beautiful Village in the Cliffs
name_original: The beautiful Village in the Cliffs
description:
The beautiful Village in the Cliffs is a building strategy game.
You have to let your village grow over time. With the research-tree you can unlock new cliff-outdrops to place your buildings on and new types of buildings. A more in depth explanation of the game is in the in-game tutorial.

This game is an submission to the GoGodotJam and was made with the great Godot Game-Engine.

Mechanics (also shown in the in-game tutorial):

  • Scroll Wheel to zoom in and out
  • Right Mouse Button to move view
  • Left Mouse Button (Drag and Drop) to place new buildings

I'm a 16 year old student from Europe. I and a few friends started a small Indie Game Studio. We would love to see You on our Discord.

(As the rest of our studio was in vacation, I made this game on my own)
